https://tmrev.io/movie/159002-Cutie and the Boxer 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Aq1lwd2yQGNaoEPv3ivHSkCK9B.jpg This candid New York love story explores the chaotic 40-year marriage of famed boxing painter Ushio Shinohara and his wife, Noriko. Anxious to shed her role as her overbearing husband's assistant, Noriko finds an identity of her own. Cutie and the Boxer
